page.title: 07Arts and Crafts (cont.)
page.content: The Taena pottery mark was a round circle with a cross in, but is now a round circle with a T in. The present smith's have lived at Taena for twenty year's. Their name's are Mr and Mrs Lowery. They work mainly by commision but they have several thing's on show. Mrs Lowery also does sculpture and painting's. They also work in gold. All silver and gold item's are hall marked. Mr and Mrs Lowery belong to the Guild of Gloucestershire craftsmen. They show their work at Painswick. Mr Lowery also does caligraphy.
